name: Owl Long Day
description: Play a platformer that revolves around an owl that gets rejected by a tech company over images of his past. Throughout the day, our owl has to grapple with his embarrassing memories from so long ago and deal with their repercussions. While hopping around a city, the player runs into “Chad Owls” that don’t seem to care about the owl’s emotional state. He has to deal with problems from his digital past whilst avoiding trouble in the physical world. The owl seemingly has to do this all by himself, but maybe he doesn’t?
